message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We propose to sell the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive and tailored to recognize the significant value this product holds for you. We believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the product while allowing you to secure it at a favorable rate. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.
